UniqueId.description: Globally unique id of this group

Title.description: The name of the component group. Will be displayed on the component group page and navigation

IconGlyph.description: Glyph of this component group. Will be displayed as an icon for the NavigationViewItem of this component group

IsSpecialSection.description: Indicates that this section is not a regular control section but is added to the navigation differently

Folder.description: Use to indicate a special child item for this folder. Only used when IsSpecialSection is true

UniqueId.description: Globally unique id of this component

Title.description: Name of this component. Will be displayed in the overview card and on top of the component page of this component

ApiNamespace.description: Namespace of this component will appear below the tile on the component's detail page'

Subtitle.description: Brief usage of this component. Will be displayed on the overview card of this component

Description.description: Description of this component. Will be displayed on the component page, below the Title of this component

ImagePath.description: An image icon of this component. Will be displayed on the overriew card of this component. Should be a uri starts with ms-appx:///Assets/componentImages/...

IsNew.description: Whether this is a newly added component. If true, it will be displayed in the Recently Added Component section on the main page and will have a dot on the overview card of this component

IsUpdated.description: Whether the example page of this component has been updated lately. If true, it will be displayed in the Recently Updated Component section on the main page and will have a dot on the overview card of this component

Title.description: Link name that appears in the Documentation dropdown

Docs.description: Add a link to the doc in the Documentation dropdown on the detail page of this component
